description: Created to mark the 50th anniversary of Ralph Lauren, the RL67 jacket draws inspiration from a herringbone sport coat that has been a treasured part of Mr. Lauren's wardrobe since 1971. This reinterpretation is made in America from a black-and-white wool tweed that was developed exclusively for Polo by a storied Irish mill.
fitting_details: Trim fit, with a soft shoulder, a high armhole, 4" lapels, and a shorter length.
Size 40R jacket has a 30" front body length, a 29½" back body length, an 18½" shoulder, and a 17½" sleeve inseam.
Notch lapels. Buttoned throat latch. Black Watch undercollar. Two-button silhouette.
Suede elbow patches. Cuffs with four decorative buttons.
Left chest welt pocket. Two front waist flapped pockets. Two interior chest pockets. Interior left waist welt pocket.
Alterations available in Ralph Lauren retail stores.
Shell: lambswool, alpaca wool. Body lining: cupro. Sleeve lining: viscose. Dry clean. Made in USA. Imported fabric.
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size 40R.
